reviews.review: Es muy entretenido para pasar el rato con tus amigos 100% recomendado
el juego es muy adictivo y divertido pero todas las partidas sin excepcion van a ser gente toxica(avisados quedais)aunque si te aguantas eso y te lo tomas a risa no vas a tener ningun problema

Broke, glitched, bugged, unplayable, roto. 

Empezaron a meter cosas mÃ¡s rÃ¡pido de lo que pueden arreglarlas resultando en un producto roto que apenas funciona, habilidades desabilitadas, la mitad de los mapas fueron removidos por bugs, las misiones (los tomos) se te buguean y no se puede progresar, te comes pantallas de cargas infinitas, se te buguea el lobby y todos tus amigos tienen que reiniciar el juego y un LARGUISIMO etc. y eso sin contar las controversias en las que se mete la empresa tambiÃ©n. 

En algÃºn momento fue un juegazo, pero los desarrolladores le meten menos ganas al juego que yo a mi vida.

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single farther to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2020 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, made my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join.  I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

Some people get really mad when you play certain killers. (July 27th 2020)

                                                             (N O W)   as in November 11th 2021

Bhvr completely changed killer from being my favorite part of my 690.4 hours in the game, to the most unplayable, and disappointing parts of the whole game as of now. After MMR was pushed to live servers there was no hope left for people who enjoyed killer more then survivor. (BTW the MMR caps out at 1900.........and a fresh account starts at 1100) Now every match you play will have the toughest meta perk abusing survivors out there (Most of the time in a group :]). So if you intend on buying this game for the sole purpose of playing killer, hear a warning, you'll have fun for your first few wins, but as soon as you hit a high enough MMR you'll wanna tear this game to shreds.  

Until either MMR is removed or the entire killer side receives a buff I will not be playing killer

Fix your game Bhvr

Edit, again: Meh... The Artist kinda just makes killer easy soooooooo I dunno 5/10
it is little toxic sometimes but hella fun lmao buy it and keep using flashlights and point em on killers and youre good
Prob one of the best asymmetrical multiplayer games out there. Also great if you love horror movies and want to play your favorite psycho
This game is great, there are really toxic killers that tunnel you, and camp you and also other survivors that want to work with killer but there are really great people on this game.
Still good after 4 years. Worth the price.
issa scary game. jk u will die

Pretty fun game, but it takes a while before you know what to do and how to play it properly.

I absolutely love this game. It takes some skill and interaction with the other players especially if your playing survivor. You have to really concentrate to make the moves necessary to complete challenges and that is what I like most about this game. It is very challenging.
its fun but better with friends

Awesome game to play with friends (survivor) when they are around or to play just by yourself when they are busy (killer). Awesome game all around. No cosmetics are required to have fun. Having some of the characters is fun to have the perks but not necessary.
